title: Resolution wont fit what so ever
body: so when i updated my windows it just stuffed up my league my resolution used to be 1920 x 1080 and now when i do that in full screen it just goes too big

replies.body: With the recent update, it's important to make sure that your drivers are up to date.  This following [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) will provide steps to help get you updated.  Affterwards, confirm your monitor's resolution and adjust your in-game resolution via Video options during the match.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
